Ingredients.1: 1 quart vegetable oil for frying, or as needed

Ingredients.6: 1 (1.25 ounce) package dry taco seasoning mix

Ingredients.13: 1 dash hot sauce, or to taste

Ingredients.14: 1 cup dry bread crumbs, or more as needed

Directions.1: Heat vegetable oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place onion, green bell pepper, egg, garlic, taco seasoning, baking powder, peanut oil, cumin, salt, and cayenne pepper in a food processor. Puree until smooth.

Directions.3: Pour pinto beans into mixture and pulse until pinto beans are chopped and integrated, but not smooth.

Directions.4: Transfer bean mixture to a large bowl; stir hot sauce into mixture.

Directions.5: Stir enough bread crumbs into mixture to form a dough that holds together, but isn't sticky.

Directions.7: Deep-fry in hot oil until falafel are deep brown, about 3 to 5 minutes.
